thePattern.title: The Pay-to-Play Pattern
steps: Donate to DeSantis PAC or Republican Party of Florida
No-bid contract awarded under emergency powers
Contract documents not posted to FACTS database
No audit conducted (despite law requiring it)
Donate more, get appointed to boards

keyQuote.text: The state government in Tallahassee got drunk on emergency powers in the pandemic and they just haven't stopped. It's a feast for politically connected donors that want to get their hands on no-bid contracts.
keyQuote.attribution: Jose Javier Rodriguez, Democratic candidate for Florida Attorney General
